synopsis.text: Aikawa Ren and Nakabeni Yua find themselves in a unique opportunity to model for an illustrator's photo collection, but the prospect leaves them feeling nervous. In an effort to alleviate their anxiety, their friend Moegi Homi steps in to conduct a practice photoshoot. As the girls struggle to relax during individual shots, Homi suggests they try posing together, hoping their mutual presence will help them unwind. The result is an enchanting array of images featuring the pair in black stockings, creating a captivating display of intertwined legs. This special episode, included in the Blu-ray/DVD release, showcases the girls' journey from apprehension to confidence, all while deepening their bond.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
